verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י׀ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become בַּשָּׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> bash-sha-Nah year הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗ית <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'It, And it came to pass in the seventh בַּֽחֲמִשִׁי֙ <S%H2549><s%> ba-cha-mi-Shi in the fifth בֶּעָשׂ֣וֹר <S%H6218><s%> be-'a-Sor [month] the tenth לַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh, [day] of the month בָּ֧אוּ <S%H935><s%> Ba-'u came אֲנָשִׁ֛ים <S%H582><s%> 'a-na-Shim [that] certain מִזִּקְנֵ֥י <S%H2205><s%> miz-zik-Nei of the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לִדְרֹ֣שׁ <S%H1875><s%> lid-Rosh to enquire אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ <S%H3427><s%> vai-ye-she-Vu and sat לְפָנָֽי׃ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nai. before ס sa-Mek

וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- Then came the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. unto me saying

GOD

הֲתִשְׁפֹּ֣ט <S%H8199><s%> ha-tish-Pot Wilt thou judge אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam, הֲתִשְׁפּ֖וֹט <S%H8199><s%> ha-tish-Pot wilt thou judge בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- them son אָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam; of man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- תּוֹעֲבֹ֥ת <S%H8441><s%> to-'a-Vot the abominations אֲבוֹתָ֖ם <S%H1><s%> a-vo-Tam of their fathers הוֹדִיעֵֽם׃ <S%H3045><s%> ho-di-'Em. [them];cause them to know

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta And say אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, to כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַר֮ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִה֒ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD בְּיוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> be-yOm In the day בָּחֳרִ֣י <S%H977><s%> bo-cho-Ri when I chose בְיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> ve-Yis-ra-'El, Israel וָאֶשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> va-'es-Sa and lifted up יָדִ֗י <S%H3027><s%> ya-Di, mine hand לְזֶ֙רַע֙ <S%H2233><s%> le-Ze-ra' unto the seed בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit of the house יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko, of Jacob וָאִוָּדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> va-'iv-va-Da' and made myself known לָהֶ֖ם <S%H99999><s%> la-Hem בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz unto them in the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt וָאֶשָּׂ֨א <S%H5375><s%> va-'es-Sa when I lifted יָדִ֤י <S%H3027><s%> ya-Di up mine hand לָהֶם֙ <S%H99999><s%> la-Hem לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, unto them saying אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. your God

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom In the day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, which נָשָׂ֤אתִי <S%H5375><s%> na-Sa-ti [that] I lifted up יָדִי֙ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Di mine hand לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, לְהֽוֹצִיאָ֖ם <S%H3318><s%> le-ho-tzi-'Am unto them to bring them forth מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into אֶ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz into a land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- i תַּ֣רְתִּי <S%H8446><s%> Tar-ti that I had espied לָהֶ֗ם la-Hem, זָבַ֤ת <S%H2100><s%> za-Vat for them flowing חָלָב֙ <S%H2461><s%> cha-Lav with milk וּדְבַ֔שׁ <S%H1706><s%> u-de-Vash, and honey צְבִ֥י <S%H6643><s%> tze-Vi which [is] the glory הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> hi which לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol of all הָאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'a-ra-Tzot. of all lands

וָאֹמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar Then said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem, about אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man שִׁקּוּצֵ֤י <S%H8251><s%> shik-ku-Tzei the abominations עֵינָיו֙ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nav of his eyes הַשְׁלִ֔יכוּ <S%H7993><s%> hash-Li-chu, I unto them Cast ye away וּבְגִלּוּלֵ֥י <S%H1544><s%> u-ve-gil-lu-Lei not yourselves with the idols מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּטַּמָּ֑אוּ <S%H2930><s%> tit-tam-Ma-'u; and defile אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. your God

וַיַּמְרוּ־ <S%H4784><s%> vai-yam-ru- But they rebelled בִ֗י Vi, וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor אָבוּ֙ <S%H14><s%> 'a-Vu against me and would לִּשְׁמֹ֣עַ <S%H8085><s%> lish-Mo-a' not hearken אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, unto אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish unto me they did not every man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שִׁקּוּצֵ֤י <S%H8251><s%> shik-ku-Tzei the abominations עֵֽינֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-nei-Hem of their eyes לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor הִשְׁלִ֔יכוּ <S%H7993><s%> hish-Li-chu, cast away וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et גִּלּוּלֵ֥י <S%H1544><s%> gil-lu-Lei the idols מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor עָזָ֑בוּ <S%H5800><s%> 'a-Za-vu; neither did they forsake וָאֹמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar then I said לִשְׁפֹּ֧ךְ <S%H8210><s%> lish-Poch I will pour out חֲמָתִ֣י <S%H2534><s%> cha-ma-Ti my fury עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, on לְכַלּ֤וֹת <S%H3615><s%> le-chal-Lot upon them to accomplish אַפִּי֙ <S%H639><s%> 'ap-Pi my anger בָּהֶ֔ם <S%H99999><s%> ba-Hem, בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch against them in the midst אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

וָאַ֙עַשׂ֙ <S%H6213><s%> va-'A-'as But I wrought לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an the sake שְׁמִ֔י <S%H8034><s%> she-Mi, for my name's לְבִלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> le-vil-Ti that it הֵחֵ֛ל <S%H2490><s%> he-Chel sake that it should not be polluted לְעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> le-'ei-Nei before הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim the heathen אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- whom הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah like בְתוֹכָ֑ם <S%H8432><s%> ve-to-Cham; among אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whose נוֹדַ֤עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> no-Da'-ti I made myself known אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem about לְעֵ֣ינֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5869><s%> le-'Ei-nei-Hem, whom they [were] in whose sight לְהוֹצִיאָ֖ם <S%H3318><s%> le-ho-tzi-'Am unto them in bringing them forth מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

וָאֽוֹצִיאֵ֖ם <S%H3318><s%> va-'o-tzi-'Em Wherefore I caused them to go forth מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt וָאֲבִאֵ֖ם <S%H935><s%> va-'a-vi-'Em and brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into הַמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> ham-mid-Bar. them into the wilderness
